# gulp-karma [![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
<!-- [![Build status][travis-image]][travis-url]-->
> Karma plugin for gulp 3

## Deprecated

`gulp-karma` has been deprectated. Use Karma directly instead: https://github.com/karma-runner/gulp-karma
